author: Zan
name: BetterTickets
description: Button-based support tickets with additional custom cases (reasons). Built by Saurichable&Dav, then forked by Zan#6176 to add NSFW support and update to 3.5.3, then reworked pretty much fully.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs for the duration of their support ticket being open.
